Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This is the name of a unit.

“The breakout of the Megasow by animal rights activists was one of the great embarrassments to the Star Union’s civic authority. All food processing mega-corporations scrambled to conceal the news that aggressively-hormonal monster pigs packed with powerful nutrient boosters were rooting into people’s domiciles and eating residents. Corporate lawyers petitioned a CORE Tranquility Initiative to officially retract that news story. It’s all hearsay now. All parties agreed that civilized people should never see the source of their favorite foods, nor be eaten by it.”[br/]– Media-Handler Katie Herozin, “RV-10448G: Civic Rumors and Deleted Testimonials”

“一群动物权益积极分子对巨猪的一则爆料使星际联盟政权陷入了一场最严峻的窘境。所有大型食品加工企业争先恐后地想要掩盖一个报道：身上挂满了强力营养强化装置并且侵略性极强的怪物猪侵入了居民的住所，并且吃掉了许多居民。企业律师请愿执行‘核心平静法案’来正式撤回这一新闻报道。现在，这一切都变成了传闻。各方一致认为，文明之人永远都不应该看到他们最喜爱食物的本来面貌，更不应该被它们吃掉。”[br/]- 媒体管理者卡蒂·赫罗辛，“RV-10448G：民间传言与被删掉的证词”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
This is the name of a unit.

“Jek’s last words were, ‘Sassy pigs make the tastiest bacon!’ That’s when he tripped on a slop-bucket and plunged into their overcrowded pen. Of course, Jek’s piglets were bred rabid for feeding frenzies, so that’s what they did. One curious thing: I swear Jek put that slop-bucket safely away from the ledge. So how did it appear beneath his feet? Only thing I figure; the piggies did it. They ain’t that smart are they? And no, I don’t think he’d be upset even if they murdered him. Jek gave his all to his work.”[br/]– Monte Hennisson, “RV-00349F: Agricultech Incident Report”

“杰克说的最后一句话是：‘活泼好动的猪做出来的培根最好吃！’就在此时，他被一个泔水桶绊倒，一头扎进了那个拥挤不堪的猪圈。杰克饲养的猪崽子们在进食的时候向来都很狂暴，所以那些小猪就把杰克给吃掉了。但有一件事很奇怪：我发誓，杰克绝对把那个泔水桶放在了离猪圈很远的地方，那么它是如何出现在他脚下的呢？我唯一能想到的就是那些小猪崽子了，但它们有那么聪明吗？不过，即使是这些猪杀了他，我想他也不会生气，毕竟杰克把他的所有精力都放在这份工作上了。”[br/]- 蒙特·亨尼森，“RV-00349F：农业科技事故报告”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
This is the name of a unit.

“The creatures grow hungry. They are clever. I can hear them tempting me to flee, but I know I am damned. My children possess intelligence now. They can escape their bonds, but they stay to torture me. When my peers at Texilla Genetech find my body, they will acknowledge that I was correct from the beginning. It lurks in shadow. This forbidden Psynumbra Tech bestows a sadistic intelligence on its victims, even my pet cats. It mocks me in darkness. Pierce my flesh. No matter. Claws and teeth. Misfortune. I created you.”[br/]– Professor Van Domlin, “RV9487S: Personal Lab Journal”

“这些生物变得饥饿。它们很聪明，我能听见它们在诱惑我逃跑，但我知道我已经遭到了诅咒。我的孩子们现在拥有了智慧，它们本可以逃脱束缚，但却选择留下来折磨我。当特克希拉基因科技的同事们发现我的尸体时，他们将会明白，我从一开始就是正确的。它潜伏在阴影之中。这一禁忌的赛努布拉科技会给它的受害者给予施虐的智慧，甚至连我的宠物猫也是如此。它在黑暗中嘲笑我，刺穿我的血肉。无关紧要了。利爪和尖牙。厄运。我创造了你。”[br/]——范·多姆林教授，“RV9487S：个人实验室记录”
